name: Instant Pot® Turkey Cheeseburger Soup
author: Tammy Doerr
summary: Great diet-friendly variation of an old favorite, made in the Instant Pot®. Uses pureed cauliflower to thicken and make the soup creamy.
ingredients: 1 (8 ounce) package shredded sharp Cheddar cheese
directions: Turn on a multi-functional pressure cooker (such as Instant Pot®) and select Saute function
Add turkey and seasoned salt; saute until browned, about 5 minutes
Add carrots, celery, and onion; cook until just starting to soften, about 5 minutes
Add flour, dill, and pepper; cook for about 1 minute
Return turkey to the pot; add broth and potatoes
Select high pressure according to manufacturer's instructions; set timer for 10 minutes
Allow 10 to 15 minutes for pressure to build
Release pressure carefully using the quick-release method according to manufacturer's instructions, about 5 minutes
Remove the cauliflower and 1 cup of the soup liquid; blend together until smooth and creamy
Add Cheddar cheese and season to tate
Stir cauliflower puree into the pot with the rest of the soup until cheese is completely melted
